right.bio:
I combine **14+ years** of development experience with the latest **AI** technologies. I've delivered demanding projects from crypto exchanges and **Web3** to complex e-commerce solutions.

By integrating **AI** into the workflow I don't just deliver code but efficient solutions that save your time and budget. Looking for a partner who can see around the corner? You're in the right place.
